original_text: By reason of the multitude of oppressions they make the oppressed to cry: they cry out by reason of the arm of the mighty.
korean_text: 사람은 학대가 많으므로 부르짖으며 군주들의 힘에 눌려 소리치나

sentences.original_text: By reason of the multitude of oppressions
they make the oppressed to cry
by reason of the arm of the mighty
